ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: I know it took me a while get get from Lvl 15 to 16, but Lvl 10 to 15 was easy.  Just hope 16 to 17 won t be as bad. ************************** Azor Lvl 16
ygData.messageBody:
I know it took me a while get get from Lvl 15 to 16, but Lvl 10 to 15 was
easy. Just hope 16 to 17 won't be as bad.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************


> From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>
> I had the same problem from level 16 to 17. It took forever! I talked to
> some other people and they said the same thing to me.
>
> Qanin
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mystik [mailto:mystik@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 3:28 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
>
>
> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> not qute....lv 30, 35, 40, and 45 are barrier levels....which means it
takes
> way
> longer to get exp in those lv....going from 30 to 31 took almost twice as
> long
> as opposed to going from 31 to 32.....even though it will say you gain
party
> exp
> or whatever, it doesn't show much because it is a barrier lv
>
> Azor wrote:
>
> > From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > I think what she was saying is it depends on what Lvl the person you're
> > casting it on is on. Like since I'm still lvl 15 (should hit Lvl 16
> > sometime today), if casted it on me I would not get much exp back but if
> you
> > casted it on a played say that was Lvl 45 they'd get a good bit back.
> > So I take it you finally got you one of those Staff of the Observer
you've
> > been wanting forever. Hope you like it and congrats on Lvl 40. Why is
> Lvl
> > 40 gonna suck by the way? Is it like Lvl 20 when ya die you lose close
to
> a
> > bubble of exp? If thats why then I guess on Lvl 40 you what lose close
to
> > two bubbles of exp?
> >
> > **************************
> > Azor
> > Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> > **************************
> >
> > > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> > >
> > > actually, that does make a lot of sense.....it would seem that hte
> higher
> > lv you
> > > are, the more exp you can give back.....i just know now that i have to
> go
> > thru
> > > hell all over again....lv 40's gonna SUCK majorly......o btw, i have a
> > question
> > > about the staff of the observer while i'm thinking about it....it has
> one
> > charge
> > > of the sentinel spell....<which is a crock ir should be unlimited like
> the
> > > jboots> but is there anyway to recharge it or maybe does it recharge
on
> > it's own
> > > <that was suggested to me by a guildmate> or do i just have to get a
new
> > staff?
> > > which would suck there too....any info would be greatly appreciated on
> > this...i
> > > love that staff, and the sentinel effect was really kewl and would
come
> in
> > handy
> > > in places like cazic and lower guk....
> > >
> > > (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> > > lv 40 cleric of The Rathe
